name: Note Game
description:
A small prototype of a "rhythm game" (has no sound), just random "notes" coming down. When you miss a note it goes to the other player.

Note Game is a single  executable file, and only needs SDL to run.

Controls: [1][2][3][4] for Player 1, [7][8][9][0] for Player 2, Arrow keys for navigation, and Escape for selecting. Controls cannot currently be changed.

Powered by SDL.
